channel.title: Portfolio on Samuel Lau | Front-End Web Developer
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Samuel Lau | Front-End Web Developer

item.title: Support Desk
item.description: Support Desk is an application built using MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS) that allow people to 1) register; 2) submit ticket and 3) add note.

item.title: Simple Github Finder
item.description: Simplegithubfinder.netlify.app is a small application built using React.js that enable people to search for any GitHub user.

item.title: FitnesSwap
item.description: FitnesSwap.com is a website that aims to provide a platform for sports enthusiast to exchange their sports products.

item.title: Tanita專業身體組成分析測試 (Body Composition Monitor)
item.description: It is a poster that to introduce the members in the fitness center about the body composition monitor.

item.title: 1對1新手壺鈴訓練班 (1-on-1 Kettlebell Training Class)
item.description: This ebook serves as a companion to the participants of 1-on-1 Kettlebell training class.

item.title: 7堂家居 - 壺鈴基礎 - 網上課程 (Youtube)
item.description: It is a short vídeo that to promote an online course which the topic is about practising kettlebell in a home environment.

item.title: Evidence-Based Strength Training
item.description: “Evidence-Based Strength Training” is an eBook that to educate people different fitness ideas, as well as to cover the basic movement principles.

item.title: 做運動拉筋伸展？ 用一支五元Stick會令你有意想不到效果！(Youtube)
item.description: It is a medium-length vídeo that to instruct people how they can perform some stretching exercises using a low-budget stick as a tool.
